basic.description: Advanced seminar on selected areas of documentary or experimental cinemas. Subjects have included politically committed documentary in Canada; the anti-documentary.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Non-narrative Film I: Special Topic I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110) and 18.0 units in FILM.
